trans-unit.source: Specifies a column in which each cell contains a check box for representing a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Especifica uma coluna na qual cada célula contém uma caixa de seleção para representar um valor booliano.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> deriva o `abstract` classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.

trans-unit.source: At run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> contains check boxes in each cell that have three states by default: checked (`true`), unchecked (`false`), and <xref:System.DBNull.Value>.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> contém caixas de seleção em cada célula que tem três estados por padrão: Check (`true`), não verificado (`false`), e <xref:System.DBNull.Value>.

trans-unit.source: To use two-state check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para usar as caixas de seleção de dois estados, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Incluem propriedades adicionadas à classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>.

trans-unit.source: These properties specify the value underlying each of the column's states.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades especificam o valor subjacente de cada um dos Estados da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example first creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir primeiro cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: When using this overload to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar essa sobrecarga para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>, certifique-se de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> o valor para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> de um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example first creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir primeiro cria um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> e adiciona-o para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associado à coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> must be associated with a data source that contains <xref:System.Boolean> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> deve estar associado uma fonte de dados que contém <xref:System.Boolean> valores.

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, primeiro use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> para retornar as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> para retornar a específica <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> for a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> para um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> is then used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> é usado para criar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associated with the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associado à coluna.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the column as the default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para especificar a coluna como o padrão, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />, and specifying whether the column style is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> com o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> especificado e especificando se o estilo da coluna é uma coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, primeiro use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> para retornar as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the specific <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> para retornar a específica <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na qual uma operação está sendo interrompida.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para interromper um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether null values are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se valores nulos são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if null values are allowed, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se valores nulos são permitidos, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to false, the check boxes in the column have only two states: checked (`true`) and unchecked (`false`).
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como false, as caixas de seleção na coluna tem apenas dois estados: Check (`true`) e não verificado (`false`).

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> é modificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> of the edited column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> da coluna editada.

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha editada.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para concluir um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editing procedure committed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o procedimento de edição foi confirmado com êxito, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Notifies a column that it must relinquish the focus to the control it is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Notifica uma coluna de que ela deve liberar o foco para o controle que está hospedando.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> da célula editada.

trans-unit.source: The row number of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha da célula editada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> em que o controle deve ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor for somente leitura, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido na célula.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para mostrar a célula, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the cell for editing a value.
trans-unit.target: Prepara a célula para a edição de um valor.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the typical implementation of this method (as described in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Edit%2A> method does not site a control for editing the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de uma implementação típica desse método (conforme descrito no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> classe), o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Edit%2A> método não site a um controle para editar o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a check box is drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, uma caixa de seleção é desenhada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.Paint%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Enters a <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> into the column.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To set the actual value used when entering a null value, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o valor real usado ao inserir um valor nulo, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.EnterNullValue%2A> to enter a null value into the column.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.EnterNullValue%2A> para inserir um valor nulo na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull" /> é definida como <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor real usado ao definir o valor da coluna como <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor, digitado como <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores reais enviados por push para a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> propriedades de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue" /> é modificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> for the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The row number.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value at the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor na linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor, digitado como <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura de uma célula em uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: The height of the column.
trans-unit.target: A altura da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is 16.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 16.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that draws on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que desenha na tela.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the value to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém o valor a ser desenhado na tela.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height used when resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura usada ao redimensionar colunas.

trans-unit.source: The height used to automatically resize cells in a column.
trans-unit.target: A altura usada para redimensionar automaticamente células em uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that draws the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que desenha a célula.

trans-unit.source: The value that must fit in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor que deve se ajustar na célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the optimum width and height of a cell given a specific value to contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a melhor largura e altura de uma célula dado um valor específico para conter.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the drawing information for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as informações de desenho da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> method allows you to resize the column based on the value displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> método permite que você redimensionar a coluna com base no valor exibido.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell contains an especially large value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> method to return the optimum size of the cell based on the value.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma célula contiver um valor especialmente grande, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.GetPreferredSize%2A> método para retornar o tamanho ideal da célula com base no valor.

trans-unit.source: The optimum size takes into account not only the size of the string, but also the font used to display it.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho ideal leva em conta não apenas o tamanho da cadeia de caracteres, mas também a fonte usada para exibi-lo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor real usado ao definir o valor da coluna como <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor, digitado como <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify what text will be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar o texto que será exibido, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> property must be set to true to enter null values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.AllowNull%2A> propriedade deve ser definida como true para inserir valores nulos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores reais enviados por push para a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> propriedades de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Paints a column.
trans-unit.target: Pinta uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para o qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row referred to in the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha referenciada nos dados subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: Draws the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> and row number.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> com o determinado <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> e o número de linha.

trans-unit.source: This method paints the background with the background color in the graphics object passed in.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pinta o plano de fundo com a cor de plano de fundo no objeto graphics passado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para o qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table being referred to.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente sendo referenciada.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o conteúdo deve ser alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content is aligned to the right, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o conteúdo for alinhado à direita, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, row number, and alignment settings.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> com o determinado <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, número de linha e configurações de alinhamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> para o qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador no qual pintar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> of the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table being referred to.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente sendo referenciada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> used to paint the background color.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> usado para pintar a cor da tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> used to paint the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> usado para pintar a cor de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o conteúdo deve ser alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content is aligned to the right, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o conteúdo for alinhado à direita, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> with the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, row number, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />, and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn" /> com o determinado <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, número de linha, <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> e <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints the check box in the column.
trans-unit.target: Pinta a caixa de seleção na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> for the column.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The row number.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha.

trans-unit.source: The value to set, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser definido, digitado como <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a specified row.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor de uma linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the actual value used when setting the value of the column to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor real usado ao definir o valor da coluna como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor, digitado como <see cref="T:System.Object" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> properties determine the actual values pushed into the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A> propriedades determinam os valores reais enviados por push para a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.FalseValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.NullValue%2A> propriedades de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue" /> property value is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn.TrueValue" /> é alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.
